trans-unit.source: By default, the small scrolling size decreases every time you zoom in, until it reaches the value of the SmallScrollMinSize property. You can set the small scrolling size to a fixed value using the SmallScrollSize property.
trans-unit.target: By default, the small scrolling size decreases every time you zoom in, until it reaches the value of the SmallScrollMinSize property. You can set the small scrolling size to a fixed value using the SmallScrollSize property.
